content: Lotta Celts criticism in the comments. As a Blazers fan, what I see when I watch the East this year is that Boston matches up better against the Cavs (doesn’t mean they’d win a 7-game series) than they do vs. the Raptors, and a lot better than they match up with the Wiz. As someone else noted, at least the Cavs might have to play two tough series to reach the Finals this year.
